segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center of the kitchen, towards an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a wobbly two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A "COOKIE JAR" sits inside, and his hand is definitely in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, perhaps to catch the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Next to him, a little girl stands with her arm raised, an expectant look on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their innocent, yet daring, little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect act of childhood mischief, right under the nose of the busy adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the stool is tilted though, makes me incredibly nervous for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance and crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on the cookies, they probably don't even see the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost sweet how they’re cooperating on this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
